titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring His Maiesties pleasure, in the incorporating of the tradesmen and artificers, inhabiting within three miles of the citie of London.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVestminster, the foure and twentieth day of February, in the twelfth yeere of our reigne. ...
Arms 24; Steele notation: Our places 2) of preiudiced.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
